name: David J. Anderson
background: David J. Anderson is a management consultant, engineer, and pioneer of the Kanban Method for knowledge work and software development. He adapted lean manufacturing principles from Toyota into the Kanban Method (2007), emphasizing evolutionary change for service delivery organizations.

principles.description: Agree to pursue incremental, evolutionary change
principles.falsification: When agree to pursue incremental, leads to worse outcomes than alternatives
